title: Grant Budget Generator
description: This web application helps principal investigators and other person to manage grant .

title: Pet Management System
description: This web application is a part of CS 360 class where we have to create a system where we can keep record pets of all over the world.

title: Job Tracker Web Application
description: This web application helps job seekers organize their job search process. Users can track application statuses and store interview notes. Developed using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Firebase.

title: Interactive Public Health Dashboard
description: Developed for a research project, this dashboard visualizes health data interactively. Built using Python, Plotly, and Dash, it provides statistical insights and trends through interactive charts and graphs.

title: Personal Portfolio Website
description: This website showcases my projects, resume, and contact information. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it's designed to provide an easy overview of my work for collaborators and employers.

title: Codedamm Projects
description: This project is a collection of codedamm projects which was created while learning from Codedamm.

title: Typing Game
description: A fun and interactive game designed to improve typing speed and accuracy. Test your skills and compete for high scores. Built using JavaScript and modern web technologies.

title: Markdown Previewer
description: A handy tool to preview Markdown syntax in real-time. Simplifies writing and formatting content with instant visual feedback. Developed using React for a seamless user experience.

title: React Calculator
description: A fully functional calculator built using React. Offers basic arithmetic operations with a clean and intuitive user interface. Great for quick calculations.

title: Form Validator
description: A dynamic form validation tool to ensure input accuracy and usability. Highlights errors in real-time and improves form submission workflows. Created with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Pomodoro Clock
description: A productivity timer inspired by the Pomodoro Technique. Helps users manage work sessions and breaks effectively. Built with JavaScript for responsive functionality.

title: Random Quote Generator
description: Generates random inspirational quotes with a click of a button. A simple and elegant tool to uplift your mood, developed using JavaScript and APIs.

title: Tic Tac Toe
description: This project was a pet project created with the purpose of learning ReactJS. Eventhough I learnt React, I couldn't fully complete this project.

title: Chloropeth Chart
description: This project was a part of freeCodeCamp Certification Courses. Developed using VanillaJS, it shows percentage of Bachelors graduate in that area.
